sentences.en: As he tried to crawl away, he was hit in the shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他试图爬走时肩膀中枪了。

sentences.en: At times the president's motorcade slowed to a crawl.
sentences.cn: 有时总统车队放慢速度缓缓而行。

sentences.en: David had been on a pub crawl with pals from his rugby club.
sentences.cn: 大卫曾和他橄榄球俱乐部的朋友们一起串酒吧喝酒。

sentences.en: Hairpin turns force the car to crawl at 10 miles an hour in some places.
sentences.cn: 在一些地段，U形弯路使得汽车只能以每小时10英里的速度缓慢行进。

sentences.en: He will crawl anywhere if he can gain something by it.
sentences.cn: 他到处钻营,只要能有所得.

sentences.en: I began to crawl on my hands and knees towards the door.
sentences.cn: 我开始手脚并用朝门口爬去。

sentences.en: I hated this man, his very touch made my skin crawl.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌这个男人，他碰我一下我都觉得恶心。

sentences.en: I watched the moth crawl up the outside of the lampshade.
sentences.cn: 我看着飞蛾爬到灯罩外面。

sentences.en: It makes my flesh crawl to hear you.
sentences.cn: 听你这么叫我身上都起鸡皮疙瘩.

sentences.en: She slowed the car to a crawl.
sentences.cn: 她把车开得很慢.

sentences.en: The baby crawled across the floor.
sentences.cn: 宝宝爬过地板。

sentences.en: The floor was crawling with ants.
sentences.cn: 地板上爬满了蚂蚁。

sentences.en: The traffic had slowed to a crawl.
sentences.cn: 车辆放慢速度，缓缓行进。

sentences.en: The traffic on the approach road slowed to a crawl.
sentences.cn: 引路上车辆行驶缓慢。

sentences.en: The traffic on the off-ramp slowed to a crawl.
sentences.cn: 驶出匝道的交通慢得在爬进。

sentences.en: The worm struggled for a while before starting to crawl again.
sentences.cn: 这可怜的小虫子,此刻将会被懊丧淹没.

sentences.en: They have no right to crawl me for what I wrote.
sentences.cn: 他们无权责怪我所写的东西.

sentences.en: We crawled into bed at 2 am.
sentences.cn: 我们凌晨两点爬上了床。

sentences.en: We learn to crawl before we learn to walk.
sentences.cn: 我们学会走路之前先要学会爬.

sentences.en: Worms and snakes crawl.
sentences.cn: 虫类和蛇爬行.

words.tran_cn: 爬行；[水产]养鱼池；匍匐而行

phrases.tran_cn: 慢行通过的空间；供电线或水管等通过的槽隙

trans.tran_cn: 缓慢的速度，爬泳，自由泳
trans.tran_en: a way of swimming in which you lie on your stomach and move one arm, and then the other, over your head

trans.tran_cn: 爬行， 蠕动； 缓慢行进
trans.tran_en: to move along on your hands and knees with your body close to the ground
to move along on your hands and knees with your body close to the ground

trans.tran_cn: 爬， 爬行； 缓慢地行进
trans.tran_en: to move along on your hands and knees with your body close to the ground
to move along on your hands and knees with your body close to the ground
